home.name: Veera Alt
home.intro1: I'm a fullstack developer based in Sydney, Australia. I specialize in creating responsive and accessible websites that are aesthetically pleasing.
home.intro2: I've had the privilege to contribute software to diverse projects, from a large university to a bustling auctioning website and a growing IT staffing company.
home.intro3: When I'm not coding, I enjoy bouldering and diving into various projects, from learning to knit to crafting furniture.

cv.intro: Find my resume/CV below. You can also download it or open it in a new tab.
